welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brighouse, UK! This charming town is known for its historic architecture and friendly residents. We invite you to explore and experience all that Brighouse has to offer during your stay. Enjoy!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is primarily used for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Dedicated to long-haul flights and international carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
